response: Late checkouts from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM are charged at 25% of the daily rate. Late checkouts from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM are charged at 50% of the daily rate. Checkouts beyond 5:00 PM are charged at 100% of the daily rate
